title.narrative: Collaboration Un-Habitat – China Center For Urban Development (Ccud)

description.narrative:
This project is set up to administer the activities under the MOU with CCUD, in so far as funding is being provided by CCUD, and will provided by Shenzhen Insititute of Building Research Co. Ltd at the end of Dec 2017.
The results will reported under 3 WP EAs
·For the conferences : EA1 - Enhanced awareness on sustainable urban development among the public and the media, EDM/2016-2017 (6.1)
·For the advisory services to pilot cities : EA2 - Improved capacity of institutions and individuals who are directly involved in the formulation and implementation of local and national policies and programmes in support to the New Urban Agenda and Habitat III - SP7/2016-2017 (3.1)
·For the joint research and publications : EA3 - Increased dissemination and awareness of knowledge on sustainable urbanisation issues - SP7/2016-2017 (2.1)
The first funding agreement of USD102,000 is for two activities:
1.Participation in the first conference in Chengdu on 21-22 July 2017, including staff time and operational costs for coordination
2.Staff time and operational costs for the preparation of activities under EA2 and EA3

participating-org.narrative: CHINA CENTER FOR URBAN DEVELOPMENT GOVERNMENT OF CHINA
SHENZHEN INSTITUTE OF BUILDING RESEARCH CO LTD

department.narrative: Regional Office for Asia and the Pacific
